name: Piero Valenzano
introduction: Piero Valenzano (born 15 April 1925 and died 10 July 1955) was an Italian racing driver who raced mainly in sports cars. He was entered into the 1955 Belgian Grand Prix with the works-Lancia team, but did not take part in the event because Lancia withdrew from the event following the death of Alberto Ascari in a test session.
